description: Sample test inputs for system response monitoring - diverse categories
inputs: I'm feeling completely burned out at work. Every task feels overwhelming.
My team lead keeps pushing unrealistic deadlines. How do I set boundaries?
I witnessed a colleague being scapegoated in our meeting today. It felt wrong.
I'm struggling with imposter syndrome. Maybe I don't belong here.
Our workplace culture feels toxic. People are afraid to speak up.
I need to have a difficult conversation with my manager about my workload.
I'm experiencing anxiety before every team meeting.
How do I protect my mental health while staying engaged at work?
I feel like I'm constantly walking on eggshells around certain colleagues.
I want to be more authentic at work, but I'm worried about the consequences.
